How It Works Boat Logistics Food Pricing Our Promise

How do we start?

The meeting spot will be revealed upon successful reservation and payment. We offer two boat tours daily, depending on the local weather forecast. The morning tour starts at 10 AM and ends at 4 PM while the evening one runs from 4 30 PM to 9 30 PM.

Don't worry about a thing! We got you. Upon arrival we will provide each passenger with sunscreen, tanning oil, towels, a snorkel set, swimming fins, paddling boards and more!

What should I bring with?

How Many People On Board?

The maximum amount of people on board is 8 (+2 crew members). You can book the entire boat or individual tickets instead.

Yes! Check out or menu below. Let us know of any allergies or special dietary restrictions. Tell us in advance and we will provide vegan or vegeterian options if needed.

Will meals be included?

I'm In! But How Much?

The fare per person is 85€ for the morning trip and 35€ for the evening trip. To reserve the entire boat one needs to pay 680€ for the morning trip or 360€ for the evening trip. For special accomodations contact us directly.

We promise that our profesionally trained crew will guarantee a safe and enjoyable experience for everyone!

What do we promise?
